| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 6 |  | #P_f1ss | |- ( ( F : dom F -1-1-> ( Base ` W ) /\ ( Base ` W ) C_ _V ) -> F : dom F -1-1-> _V ) |

| 12 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ L e. NzRing ) /\ ( F : dom F -1-1-> _V /\ ran F e. ( LIndS ` W ) ) ) -> ran F e. ( LIndS ` W ) ) |
